paragraphs.content: Wisdom hath builded her house, she hath hewn out her seven pillars:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Wisdom hath builded her house, she hath hewn out her seven pillars:

paragraphs.content: She hath killed her beasts; she hath mingled her wine; she hath also furnished her table.
paragraphs.contentHtml: She hath killed her beasts; she hath mingled her wine; she hath also furnished her table.

paragraphs.content: She hath sent forth her maidens: she crieth upon the highest places of the city,
paragraphs.contentHtml: She hath sent forth her maidens: she crieth upon the highest places of the city,

paragraphs.content: Whoso is simple, let him turn in hither: as for him that wanteth understanding, she saith to him,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Whoso is simple, let him turn in hither: as for him that wanteth understanding, she saith to him,

paragraphs.content: Come, eat of my bread, and drink of the wine which I have mingled.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Come, eat of my bread, and drink of the wine which I have mingled.

paragraphs.content: Forsake the foolish, and live; and go in the way of understanding.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Forsake the foolish, and live; and go in the way of understanding.

paragraphs.content: He that reproveth a scorner getteth to himself shame: and he that rebuketh a wicked man getteth himself a blot.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He that reproveth a scorner getteth to himself shame: and he that rebuketh a wicked man getteth himself a blot.

paragraphs.content: Reprove not a scorner, lest he hate thee: rebuke a wise man, and he will love thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Reprove not a scorner, lest he hate thee: rebuke a wise man, and he will love thee.

paragraphs.content: Give instruction to a wise man, and he will be yet wiser: teach a just man, and he will increase in learning.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Give instruction to a wise man, and he will be yet wiser: teach a just man, and he will increase in learning.

paragraphs.content: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom: and the knowledge of the holy is understanding.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom: and the knowledge of the holy is understanding.

paragraphs.content: For by me thy days shall be multiplied, and the years of thy life shall be increased.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For by me thy days shall be multiplied, and the years of thy life shall be increased.

paragraphs.content: If thou be wise, thou shalt be wise for thyself: but if thou scornest, thou alone shalt bear it.
paragraphs.contentHtml: If thou be wise, thou shalt be wise for thyself: but if thou scornest, thou alone shalt bear it.

paragraphs.content: ¶ A foolish woman is clamorous: she is simple, and knoweth nothing.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ A foolish woman is clamorous: she is simple, and knoweth nothing.

paragraphs.content: For she sitteth at the door of her house, on a seat in the high places of the city,
paragraphs.contentHtml: For she sitteth at the door of her house, on a seat in the high places of the city,

paragraphs.content: To call passengers who go right on their ways:
paragraphs.contentHtml: To call passengers who go right on their ways:

paragraphs.content: Whoso is simple, let him turn in hither: and as for him that wanteth understanding, she saith to him,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Whoso is simple, let him turn in hither: and as for him that wanteth understanding, she saith to him,

paragraphs.content: Stolen waters are sweet, and bread eaten in secret is pleasant.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Stolen waters are sweet, and bread eaten in secret is pleasant.

paragraphs.content: But he knoweth not that the dead are there; and that her guests are in the depths of hell.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But he knoweth not that the dead are there; and that her guests are in the depths of hell.
